stateDiagram

classDef active fill:yellow,stroke-width:2px;

STATE_1

STATE_1 : STATE_1

STATE_1 : enter / #123; print("S1 enter")#59; #125;

STATE_1 : do / #123; print("S1 do")#59; #125;

STATE_1 : exit / #123; print("S1 exit")#59; #125;

STATE_2

STATE_2 : STATE_2

STATE_2 : enter / #123; print("S2 enter")#59; #125;

STATE_2 : exit / #123; print("S2 exit")#59; #125;

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

STATE_1 --> STATE_2 : MY_EVENT_1

STATE_2 --> STATE_1 : MY_EVENT_2

ROOT.(InitialState) --> STATE_1
Events
settings
